## Overview

Multiple fencing problems in one document.

### Missing Language

```
SELECT * FROM users;
```

### Closing With Language

```sql
INSERT INTO users (name) VALUES ('test');
```sql

### Another Bare Opening

```
def function():
    pass
```

This document has multiple validation errors.
